name: MONOCHROME (EdgeOfWorlds)
description:
Monochrome is a puzzler side-scrolling game with the objective to get through the levels. Play as your character who has lost his colour and restore it from its monochromatic state!

  • 16 Bit Design
  • 15 Levels
  • Retro animations
  • Floaty boxes

Release date - 17/11/2016

Platform - PC

Price - Free
